= Getting the Source =

There are two ways to get the source code:
  * Download the the [http://web.eecs.umich.edu/~soar/downloads/SoarSuite/SoarSuite_9.3.4-source.zip 9.3.4 platform-independent source].  This will contain the last major release of the entire !SoarSuite.
*OR*
  * Pull the latest code directly from the [https://github.com/SoarGroup/Soar Soar git repository on github].  Information about using git can be found on github.
  
  You can now skip to your operating system build notes:

  * [BuildWindows Windows Build Notes]
  * [BuildLinux Linux Build Notes]
  * [BuildMac Mac OS X Build Notes]
